name: Pony Realistic Max(PRM)
description:
Pony Realistic MAX (PRM)

About this model

Welcome to Pony Realistic, a custom Stable Diffusion model that can generate amazing images of ponies and other furry characters. This model is created by me, Amber2024, and it is based on the Pony Diffusion V4 model(Pony Diffusion - V4 | Stable Diffusion Checkpoint | Civitai). I have improved it by adding the Txt2Img mode, which allows you to input text and get an image based on it. You can also use negative prompts to suppress unwanted features. For example, “safe -nudity”. This model can produce realistic and detailed images that will impress you and your friends. If the original creators of base models thinks there are some factors such as policies or other problems with this model, please tell our group immediately and this model will abide to the rules of the base models(with some beta policies as extension).

How to use this model

To use this model, you need to have Stable Diffusion installed on your device. You can download it from here: AUTOMATIC1111/stable-diffusion-webui: Stable Diffusion web UI (github.com)

Once you have Stable Diffusion, you can download my model from this page and load it on your device. Then you can start generating images by typing text prompts. For example, “a blue pony with a rainbow mane”. You can also adjust the parameters of the model to change the quality and diversity of the outputs. For example, you can use upscaler such as Topaz Gigapixel or the Ultra Sharp 4x model to enhance the resolution and sharpness of the images.

Terms and conditions(Policies)

I’m happy to share this model with you and I hope you enjoy using it. However, I ask you to respect my work and follow these terms and conditions:

  • Please do not combine this model with other models (in combine checkpoints nor train in LORA). This model is unique and I want to keep it that way.

  • Please give me credit when you post the images generated by this model. You can cite this webpage or my deviantart page (https://www.deviantart.com/amber2024). If you join my Pony-AI-Art Group on Deviantart (https://www.deviantart.com/pony-ai-art) and submit your work to the group, you don’t need to cite me. If you are posting on Deviantart then you DO NOT NEED TO CITE.

  • Please do not sell the generated images because this is a non-profit model. I made this model for fun and for sharing with other pony and furry fans. However if you want to sell it, then please reply below or email me at ocillus@outlook.com (I will 90% chance agree if your price for sell is appropriate considering it is an Artificial Intelligence artwork)

You can do the following things with this model:

  • You can post the artworks generated by this model on any art platform as long as you give me credit (unless you are a member of my group).

  • You can use this model’s generations in whatever type of project as a background or a minor part you like even if the project is commercial but you still need to give me credit.

  • You can use these generated pictures as your profile pictures or account pictures without giving me credit.

Thank you for understanding and following these policies. I appreciate your support and respect.

Contact and support

If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback about this model, please contact me at ocillus@outlook.com or leave a comment on this page. I would love to hear from you and see your creations.

You can also follow me on Deviantart: @Amber2024 or @Ocillus

Join Pony-AI-Art Group on Deviantart: https://www.deviantart.com/pony-ai-art

This is a friendly and supportive community where you can share your artworks, get tips and advice, and collaborate with other pony and furry enthusiasts.

I hope you have fun with this model and create some awesome images. Thank you for choosing Pony Realistic Max.

NST Department-Celsia

modelVersions.name: v1.0 Commercial Free+CITE
modelVersions.description: Hi, this model is now Commercial Free(you can sell the generated pictures but you will have to cite this model and tell your customer that this artwork is generated by an Artificial Intelligence model instead of a human).
